title: ERGO General Insurance Company Limited.
sample_text:
Policy wording, Policy Schedule and any Endorsements 
thereto shall be considered one document and any word or 
expression to which a specific meaning has been attached 
in any of them shall bear such meaning throughout unless 
specified otherwise.
The terms set out in this Policy and its Schedule will be the 
basis for any claim under this Policy.
Words and phrases that appear in bold letters have, for the 
purpose of this Policy, a special meaning which can be read in 
the Definitions section. They have this meaning wherever they 
appear in the Policy, including the Policy Schedule/Certifica

title: SECTION 1: DEFINITIONS
sample_text:
1.	
Accessories means attachments or consumables provided 
by original equipment manufacturer along with Insured 
Object
2.	
Accident/Accidental means a sudden, unforeseen and 
involuntary event caused by external and visible means.
3.	
Misplacement means unintentionally leaving the Insured 
Object at a place whereby You are permanently not able 
to use it or locate it.
4.	
Act of God means Lightning, Earthquake, Storm, 
Cyclone, Typhoon, Tempest, Hurricane, Tornado, Flood 
& Inundation.
5.	
Agreed Value means the value agreed at the time of 
issuance of policy by You and remains fixed during

title: 10.	 Cover means the coverage specified in the policy
sample_text:
schedule for your Insured Object(s) including optional 
covers if any.
11.	
Cover Period means the indemnity period of the Cover 
as specified in Your Policy Schedule / Certificate of 
Insurance.

title: 12.	 Deductible means the amount which is to be borne by
sample_text:
You before any payment of claim made under this Policy/
Certificate of Insurance. This will apply separately for 
each and every claim.

title: 13.	 Depreciation means the reduction in the value of the
sample_text:
Insured Object due to Ageing, Use, Wear & Tear or 
Obsolescence. The depreciation % of Your object is 
specified in Your Policy Schedule/Certificate of Insurance 
and is applicable at the time of Total Loss.

title: 14.	 Electrical or Mechanical Breakdown means the
sample_text:
Mechanical, Electrical and/or Electronic Defects and / 
or Failure of Insured Object which impedes its normal 
functioning.

title: 15.	 Electronic Data means facts, concepts and information
sample_text:
converted to a form useable for communications, 
interpretation or processing by electronic and 
electromechanical data processing or electronically 
controlled equipment and includes programs, software, 
and other coded instructions for the processing and 
manipulation of data or the direction and manipulation of 
such equipment.

title: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Limited. IRDAI Reg. No.146. CIN: U66030MH2007PLC177117. Registered & Corporate Office: 6th Floor, Leela
sample_text: Business Park, Andheri-Kurla Road, Andheri (East), Mumbai – 400 059. UIN: Object Insurance - IRDAN125RP0034V01202223.

title: 16.	 Floater means more than one Object(s) are insured for a
sample_text:
single sum insured mentioned on Your Policy Schedule/
Certificate of Insurance

title: 17.	 Family Members means Insured’s Spouse; Children;
sample_text:
Parents, Parents in law, You and any other persons who 
resides with You without paying a commercial rent.

title: 18.	 Fire means an actual ignition. Fire must be accompanied
sample_text:
by visible sparks or Flames. Mere heating without ignition 
scorching, charring and damage by smoke without actual 
burning is not considered as fire.

title: 19.	 Hazardous or Adventure Sports means any sport or
sample_text:
activity involving physical exertion and skill in which an 
Insured participates or competes for entertainment or as 
part of his Profession whether he / she is trained or not.

title: 20.	 Injury means Accidental physical bodily harm excluding
sample_text:
Illness or disease solely and directly caused by external, 
visible and evident means which is verified and certified 
by a Medical Practitioner.

title: 21.	 Insured Object means any physical object specified in
sample_text: Your Policy Schedule/Certificate of Insurance.

title: 22.	 Invoice Value means the original amount paid by the
sample_text:
Insured towards the purchase of the Insured Object, 
which is evidenced by an Invoice and is inclusive of any 
applicable discounts and taxes.

title: 23.	 Liquid Damage means loss or damage to the Insured
sample_text:
Object due to ingression of any type of liquid or water into 
the Insured Object that impedes its functioning. Damage 
due to moisture and/or humidity is not considered as 
Liquid Damage.

title: 24.	 Malicious Damage means intentionally causing loss or
sample_text:
damage to the Insured object by someone who is not 
a family member, employee of the Insured person or 
Insured person himself.

title: 25.	 Manufacturer’s Warranty means the original warranty
sample_text:
provided by the Manufacturer in respect of an object or 
product.

title: 26.	 Market/Replacement Value means the replacement
sample_text:
value of the Insured object by a new object less deduction 
for any advancement, wear and tear and/or depreciation.

title: 27.	 Medically Necessary treatment means any treatment,
sample_text:
test, medication, or stay in Hospital or part of stay in 
Hospital which
	
•	
Is required for the medical management of the Illness 
or Injury suffered by the Insured Person;
	
•	
Must not exceed the level of care necessary to 
provide safe, adequate and appropriate medical care 
in scope, duration or intensity.
	
•	
Must have been prescribed by a Medical Practitioner.
	
•	
Must conform to the professional standards widely 
accepted in international medical practice or by the 
medical community in India.

title: 28.	 Medical Practitioner means a person who holds a valid
sample_text:
registration from the Medical Council of any State or 
Medical Council of India or Council for Indian Medicine 
or for Homeopathy set up by the Government of India or 
a State Government and is thereby entitled to practice 
medicine within its jurisdiction; and is acting within the 
scope and jurisdiction of license. Medical Practitioner 
who is sharing the same residence with the Insured 
Person‘s and is a member of Insured Person’s family are 
not considered as Medical Practitioner under the scope 
of this Policy.
	
Medical practitioner for mental illnesses means a medical 
practitioner poss

title: 29.	 Period of Insurance means the period between the policy
sample_text:
commencement date and policy expiry date as specified 
in Your Policy Schedule / Certificate of Insurance.

title: 30.	 Non Portable Objects means all electronic and non-
sample_text:
electronic objects that are non-portable as specified in

title: 31.	 Permanent Total Disablement means that the Insured
sample_text:
Person is totally disabled from undertaking all the material 
duties of his/her usual occupation for which he/she is 
reasonably fitted by training, education or experience for a 
continuous period of 365 days and, at the expiration of the

will persist throughout the Insured Person’s lifetime.

title: 32.	 Policy means the document that provides the details

title: SECTION 2: DETAILS OF COVERAGE
sample_text:
I.	
Screen Damage
	
This Cover is applicable if mentioned in your Policy 
Schedule. In the event of any Damage to the Screen 
of Insured Object during the Cover Period, We will pay 
You upto the Sum Insured as specified in Your Policy 
Schedule/Certificate of Insurance as per applicable 
claim settlement option provided in Section 4. This is 
subject to the definitions, limitations, exclusions, terms 
and conditions of this Policy.

Damage
	
•	
Any loss falling under the covers Accidental Damage, 
Liquid Damage, Fire, Act of God, Riot, Strik

title: EMI Protect
sample_text:
On payment of additional premium, We will pay You 
Equated Monthly Instalments due on the Insured Object if 
Insured sustains Injury during Period of Insurance, which 
results in
	
a.	
Medically Necessary Hospitalization of Insured for 
a period of atleast 15 (fifteen) days, or
	
b.	
Disablement as specified in the table below, within 
6 months of occurrence of the event, as certified by 
a Medical Practitioner.
Sr. No.
Disablement
1
Loss of sight on both eyes
2
Loss of both hands
3
Loss of both feet
4
Loss of one hand and one foot
5
Loss of one eye one hand
6
Loss of one eye one foot
7
Perman

It is understood and agreed that number of claims per

On payment of additional premium, it is understood and

conditions of this Policy.

title: SECTION 3 (A): SPECIFIC EXCLUSIONS
sample_text:
Exclusions specific to the policy which can be waived on 
payment of additional premium
1.	
Pair and Set Clause: - Where any Insured Object consists 
of articles in pair or set, our liability in that respect shall 
be restricted to the intrinsic value of any particular part or 
parts which may be lost or damaged without any reference 
to special value which such article may have as part of 
such pair or set.
2.	
Misplacement: Any loss or damage due to Misplacement 
or unexplained disappearance of Insured Object.
3.	
Electrical, Mechanical and Electronic breakdown: Any 
loss or damage caused by

same time.

title: ASSESSMENT OF CLAIMS
sample_text:
Basis of Indemnity
a.	
Total Loss / Beyond Economic Repair:
	
In the event of Beyond Economic Repair or loss due to 
Theft, Burglary or Robbery, we will indemnify on one of 
the following basis, whichever is of lower value:
1.	
Sum Insured minus applicable depreciation/deductible/
salvage value if applicable as mentioned in Your Policy 
Schedule/Certificate of Insurance.
2.	
Replace Your Insured Object with another Object of 
similar make/model/specification/age.

8

a)

intimate Us in writing to the nearest office of the Company, 
on Our email ID: care@hdfcergo.com or contact number: 
022-6234 6234.
b)	
The Insured shall deliver to the Company, within 15 days 
of the date on which the event shall have come to his 
knowledge, a detailed intimation of the loss or damage, 
with an estimate of the intrinsic value of the Object lost

title: 10.	 Renewal Notice: We shall be under no obligation to renew
sample_text:
the policy on expiry of the period for which premium 
has been paid. We reserve the right to offer revised 
rates, terms and conditions at renewal based on claim 
experience and a fresh assessment of the risk..

title: 11.	 Our Rights on occurrence of loss or damage: On the
sample_text:
occurrence of any loss or damage have given rise to a 
claim under this Policy, or circumstances that may give 
rise to a claim, We or Our authorized representatives or 
surveyors may:
	
i) 	
take possession of or require to be delivered to Us 
the Insured Object, to which the loss or damage has 
been caused;
	
ii) 	
keep possession of any such Insured Object and 
examine, sort, arrange, remove or otherwise deal 
with the same; and,
	
iii) 	 sell any such Insured Object or dispose of the same 
for account of whom it may concern.

title: 12.	 Sanction and Embargo Clause: No (re)insurer shall be
sample_text:
deemed to provide cover and no (re)insurer shall be 
liable to pay any claim or provide any benefit hereunder 
to the extent that the provision of such cover, payment 
of such claim or provision of such benefit would expose 
that (re)insurer to any sanction, prohibition or restriction 
under United Nations resolutions or the trade or economic 
sanctions, laws or regulations of the European Union, 
United Kingdom or United States of America.

title: 13.	 Electronic Data Processing Media Valuation:
sample_text:
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary within the 
Policy or any endorsement thereto, it is understood and 
agreed as follows:
	
Should electronic data processing media insured by 
this Policy suffer physical loss or damage insured by this 
Policy, then the basis of valuation shall be the cost of the 
blank media plus the costs of copying the Electronic Data 
from back-up or from originals of a previous generation. 
These costs will not include research and engineering 
nor any costs of recreating, gathering or assembling such 
Electronic Data. If the media is not repaired, replaced or
